attributes.action: Create an M.P (or M.Ps) with special responsibility for the interests of the ex-pat community in Europe and to give voting rights to ex-pats to elect him/her/them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many expats of long standing in Europe have no possibility of voting for any MPs in any national government.  It is particularly appalling that many by law must pay taxes to Britain but after 15 years abroad have no right of voting for those who tax us.  We are greatly affected by the laws of Britain (especially the OAPs) and we deserve a right of representation.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " Create an M.P (or M.Ps) with special responsibility for the interests of the ex-pat community in Europe and to give voting rights to ex-pats to elect him/her/them."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15308.asp
